room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Twisted Room Escapes in Indianapolis
review: We have done around 25 escape rooms around the country and these are by far some of the best! We went to conquer The Submarine and stayed to complete the Missing Maestro and The Cabin. My personal favorite was the Cabin but all three were well planned and challenging! The four of us agreed that if you are in Indy looking for an escape room - this one has all the others beat by a mile.

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Twisted Room Escapes in Indianapolis
review: Wonderful game great clean place.  Will definitely come back and do their other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Twisted Room Escapes in Indianapolis
review: We did the Cabin and it was so much fun! The staff is super nice! Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Twisted Room Escapes in Indianapolis
review: I loved the Log Cabin Room! We had a blast doing the room with some really well thought out clues and great imagination! If you love escape rooms this is a definite must do!

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by Twisted Room Escapes in Indianapolis
review: Have done close to 80 rooms now. The Cabin is on our top five rooms. We are close to exhaust all the rooms in Indy area and the Cabin definitely is the best room in indy area. The people who run this place are like a big family and the room is beautifully done. So much fun! We did all the other rooms right after and look forward to their new rooms in the future.
